name: Platformer Demo (Jericho)
description:
Controls: WASD for movement, space for jump, left click to shoot. 

A simple platformer with hazards, ladders, bouncing mushrooms, enemies, coin pickups, and a gun that shoots projectiles. 

Credits:

The code was written by me under instruction by Gamedev.tv

Audio courtesy of Gamedev.tv

Art assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/super-platformer-assets-42...

Font: https://www.dafont.com/star-trek-future.font
